short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension to counter XSS attack!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to counter cross-site scripting attack.It automatically works in the background and alerts the user right at the browser if it finds any page that is vulnerable to XSS attack.
